Note.Content: MT HOTTP-C NIV "approach" REB GNT "coming" ESV "rises" | RSV NJPS NJB NRSV "iniquity" CEV "sin" = {L:עַוְלָה<SDBH:עַוְלָה>}

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= causative process by which a substance or other object is caused to appear to move up by itself
= action by which humans or divine beings move up in a supernatural way
= causative action by which humans or divine beings cause other humans or divine beings to move up in a supernatural way
= action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= action by which humans move away from a certain location
literally: to bring up; hence: = causative action by which deities bring humans back to life
literally: (one's) hand goes up (against someone else's hand); hence: = action by which one human behaves aggressively toward another
literally: to cause to go (in); = process by which humans provide a certain amount of raw materials to be used to produce an artifact
literally: to go up; hence: = process by which an object appears on top of or over another one
literally: to cause to go up; hence: = causative process by which an object is caused to appear on top of or over another one
literally: to go up; hence: = process by which people are dressed with certain clothes
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which objects come into existence that were not known to exist before
literally: to cause to come up; hence: = causative process by which objects are caused to come into existence that were not known to exist before
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which water bursts forth from the ground and starts flowing
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which humans or deities increase in status and importance
literally: to come up; hence: = state by which an event is about to happen
literally: to bring (upon); hence: = causative process by which deities cause certain events to happen to others
literally: to come up: hence: = process by which a certain sound or information reaches the ears of someone located in a high place
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which an object is taken by hand from the ground or a container
literally: to bring up the cud; hence: = causative action by which a ruminant animal brings up partly digested food from the stomach in order to chew it more
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which an activity increases in intensity
literally: to cause to come up; hence: = causative process by which an activity is caused to increase in intensity
literally: to go up (in smoke); hence: = process by which something disappears from existence ◄ like smoke that goes up and vanishes
literally: to go up; hence: = process by which a burnt-offering is made and its smoke goes up
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt-offering and cause its smoke to go up
literally: to climb; hence: = action by which animals mate with one another
literally: to go up; hence: = state in which one side of an area is at a higher elevation than the other
literally: to rise up; hence, possibly: = action by which a soldier takes position, ready to engage
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = causative action by which a rider causes his horse to raise itself up on its hind legs
= process by which a plant,or part of a plant, comes up from the ground or grows from a stalk
= causative process by which someone causes a plant,or part of a plant, to come up from the ground or to grow from a stalk
literally: to bring up; hence: = causative action by which a mother brings her child to adulthood
= causative action by which an object is placed on a relatively high location
literally: to be brought up over the lip; hence: = process by which people become the object of other people's conversations

Glosses.Gloss: to become an object of gossip

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: literally: to bring up (above); hence: = state in which humans assign a certain importance to something, more than to other things
literally: to come up in (one's) heart or spirit; hence: = process by which humans or deities start processing something in their minds
literally: to bring (something) up to (one's) heart; hence: = action by which humans start processing something in their minds
= process by which a certain moment in time arrives
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which certain information is recorded in a scroll
